Data: Ashwin to Warner, no run Ashwin gets good drift from round the wicket, inside edge onto the pads
Ashwin to Warner, no run little bit of turn and he tucks it to the leg side
Ashwin to Warner, no run quicker delivery and it forces him forward to drive to the off side
Ashwin to Warner, 1 run slower through the air, rocks back and clips it to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Wade, no run waits for it and and steers it to the off side, thinks of a run
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run flatter one and he pushes it towards mid-on, good start by Ashwin
Praveen to Wade, 1 run gets some late inswing but it drifts towards the body and he works it behind square on the on side
Praveen to Warner, no run away swing this time and he angles it to Jadeja at point, Jadeja has had a haircut, just to let you know
Praveen to Warner, 1 run inswing this time and he works it to midwicket
Praveen to Wade, FOUR runs not convincing, late away swing and it takes the outside edge which beats slip, Rahul dives in vain at third man
Praveen to Wade, no run Wade struggles with the away swing and he awkwardly pushes it to cover
Praveen to Wade, 1 run swings in from middle to off and he shuffles and tucks it to square leg
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run squeezes it out towards mid-off and he scampers the single, bit of hesitation
Ashwin to Warner, no run Warner wanted to go over the on side but ended up flat-batting it towards mid-off

Ashwin to Warner, SIX runs switch hit! Unbelievable! Takes it from outside the left-handers leg stump, switches his guard completely, and clears deep extra cover, several rows back, 100 meters #Unreal
Ashwin to Warner, FOUR runs low full toss outside off and he times this one well and sends it scurrying past point
Ashwin to Warner, SIX runs Ashwin stops at the crease jusgt before delivery, doesn't confuse Warner as he gets on his knee and lofts over the sight-screen

Ashwin to Warner, 2 runs appeal for a run-out, he tucks it towards midwicket and in coming back for the second run scampers to make his ground, the throw was to the bowler, didn't quite gather the ball cleanly, third umpire takes a look
Vinay to Wade, 3 runs short and he slaps it over cover point, there was some steep bounce there and Wade didn't time it as well as he would have liked
Vinay to Warner, 2 runs
Vinay to Warner, 3 runs not the most attractive of shots, makes room and carves it over backward point, Jadeja does really well to chase and pull it back
Vinay to Wade, 1 wide too wide for the left-hander, Wade nearly fell over the crease as he tried chasing that
Vinay to Wade, 1 run slashing at everything, wide outside off and he whacks it off the toe of the bat down to third man
Vinay to Warner, OUT India will be relieved to see the back of Warner, he tries to scoop a full delivery over the off side, mistimes it and Raina moves backwards at extra cover and cups the skier
Vinay to Wade, 1 run hurries on the back foot with a quick delivery and he steers it wide of point
Praveen to Wade, 2 runs full delivery on the pads and swinging in, tucked towards fine leg, not the best line to bowl
Praveen to Wade, no run cuts it hard but he fails to bisect the off side field
Praveen to Wade, 3 runs cuts with more precision this time, the slower ball and he waits for it and slices it just wide of cover point, three fielders were pretty close to each other
Praveen to Birt, no run straight on middle and off and he clips it straight to mid-on
Praveen to Birt, 1 run a bit slower this time and he knocks it just wide of mid-on
Praveen to Wade, 3 runs brilliant save by Vinay, the batsman pulls and the ball races towards the square leg rope but Vinay times his dive well and pulls it back
Vinay to Wade, 1 run a fraction short and he plays a short-arm pull down to long-on
Vinay to Birt, no run Birt tries to slice it away and he ends up chopping it down to the off side
Vinay to Birt, no run tries to steer this one down to third man and he's beaten all ends up
Vinay to Birt, no run bowls it straight and tucks him up for room, Birt decides to get behind the line and defend, good bowling
Vinay to Birt, SIX runs excellent timing, Vinay bowls length outside off and Birt lofts crisply through the line, little effort and maximum reward over long-off
Vinay to Birt, no run comes round the wicket, Birt makes room to a delivery angling inwards and ends up chopping it towards slip
Raina to Wade, no run makes room and squeezes a full delivery down to cover
Raina to Wade, 1 run makes room and biffs it on the front foot to Kohli at mid-off
Raina to Birt, no run run-out chance! Birt taps it to the off side and sets off, turns back, Dhoni runs forward, gathers and throws but there's no-one at the stumps at the batsman's end
Raina to Birt, no run tries to slog sweep a flatter delivery and nearly loses his stumps in the process
Raina to Birt, 1 run makes room and thumps it to deep point
Raina to Wade, 1 run bashes it down the pitch on the slog and just beats Raina, two fielders converge near the straight boundary and Kphli mops up, good fielding
Ashwin to Wade, SIX runs heads up at wide long-on! Looked like he tried the carrom ball, he stays at the crease and swings it rows back
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run makes room and steers it hard to third man
Ashwin to Birt, no run tries the reverse sweep and he finds backward point
Ashwin to Birt, no run fires it in and he squeezes it back to the bowler
Ashwin to Birt, no run fires it flat on the blockhole and he nearly drags it onto the stumps
Ashwin to Birt, 1 run fullish on the pads and he squirts it to the leg side
Sharma to Birt, no run Birt tries to reverse-scoop that down to third man, interesting choice of shot, missed it completely
Sharma to Birt, FOUR runs flatter delivery and he gets a thick outside edge that beats the keeper
Sharma to Birt, 2 runs tossed up outside off and he carves this down to the deep on the off side,, pretty much flashed at it
Sharma to Birt, no run Dropped He absolutely whacked that back to the bowler, tried to hammer it over the bowler but there
Rohit Sharma to Birt, 1 run goes back and steers it to the off side
Rohit Sharma to Wade, 1 run skids through and he cuts it very close to the off stumps to the off side, that would have thudded the stumps had he missed
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run too wide and the batsman has to stretch to slice that in the air past the infield
Ashwin to Birt, 1 run full toss and he makes room and bashes it to long-off
Ashwin to Wade, 2 runs goes back to a slightly short delivery and thumps it just wide of extra cover, the fielder in the deep mops up
Ashwin to Wade, no run tries to dig out a full delivery and Dhoni is alone in his appeal for a caught behind
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run makes room and force this one to long-off
Ashwin to Birt, OUT low full toss outside the off stump, Birt makes room to try and slice it over the infield on the off side and he ends up spooning it hard to cover, sharp catch
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run slightly short and he swivels and pulls behind square on the on side
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run slower through the air and he pushes it through the line to long-off
Jadeja to Wade, FOUR runs quicker delivery and Wade gets his front foot forward and smacks it in the air over cover, clean hit
Jadeja to Wade, no run
Jadeja to Wade, no run fuller delivery and he drives to cover
Jadeja to Wade, no run quicker delivery and he pushes it back to the bowler
Sharma to Hussey, no run Hussey makes room and slaps it to the off side
Sharma to Hussey, no run slower one and Hussey swings too early, the ball clips the pads
Sharma to Hussey, no run skids through the clips his pads but that would have missed leg
Sharma to Hussey, 1 wide missed stumping down the leg side, Rahul floats it quick and Dhoni fumbles
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run stays back and chops it just wide of point, Jadeja's rushed as he gathers the ball and throws
Sharma to Wade, 1 run
Sharma to Hussey, no run skids through and he's trapped at the crease, clips it to the on side, Rahul's making them think twice about stepping down the pitch
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run pushes a full delivery down to long-on
Jadeja to Wade, FOUR runs this is short on middle and leg, Wade was down the track and then adjusted his shot well and ended up pulling to fine leg
Jadeja to Wade, SIX runs high and rows behind long-on! Tossed up on leg and he stays at the crease and lofts cleanly over the on side, that brings up his fifty as well!
Jadeja to Wade, FOUR runs tries the same shot but it's flatter this time, he finds the arc over mid-on and midwicket and finds the gap perfectly
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run makes room and he chops it just wide of short third man, Sehwag dives
Praveen to Wade, FOUR runs can't call that a chance, Wade smacks a short and wide delivery and Rohit leaps at backward point and gets a finger to it, that was hit too hard
Praveen to Wade, 1 run frees his arms and mistimes the shot to long-on
Praveen to Hussey, FOUR runs tries to cut squarer but gets an inside edge which beats Dhoni and scorches past the turf
Praveen to Hussey, 2 runs places it wide of midwicket and the batsmen put pressure on the fielder and scamper home for two
Praveen to Hussey, 1 run sees him coming down the pitch and bowls the slower ball, Hussey ends up adjusting his shot and places it to cover
Praveen to Wade, SIX runs short and he
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run comes down the track and he chops it down to deep point
Sharma to Wade, no run Wade goes for the slog and misses it completely, well bowled as he got the ball to skid through
Sharma to Wade, 1 run full outside off and he squirts it to long-off
Sharma to Hussey, SIX runs clean hit! Tossed up outside the off stump and Hussey gets his front foot forward, gets under the bounce and scoops it over long-off
Sharma to Hussey, no run down the leg side, Dhoni fumbled with it but Hussey was safe
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and squeezes it to the on side
Raina to Hussey, no run comes round the wicket, he stays back and clips it to midwicket
Raina to Hussey, 1 run booming drive down the track and nearly cleans up the non-striker, down to long-off
Raina to Wade, 2 runs fires it flat and he knocks it down to short fine leg and Sehwag misfields, too late in getting down to stop it
Raina to Wade, OUT quicker delivery and much flatter, Wade exposes his stumps and is totally cramped for room as he tries to cut, loses his leg stump, end of a blistering knock
Raina to Bailey, 1 run gets forward and pushes it hard down to long-on
Raina to Hussey, 1 run pushes a flatter delivery down to long-off
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run bowls it close to the line of the off stump and he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run opens the face and dabs it down to Rahul at third man who's quite square
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run chips down the track but it's too full for him to loft, ends up dragging it down to long-on, Vinay falls and rolls on the pitch after delivery
Vinay to Bailey, no run makes room and chops it to the off side and Bailey sends Hussey back, the throw was wide of the stumps
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run moves across his stumps and tries to plough it down to fine leg across the line but it goes straight to Sehwag at short fine leg
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run length delivery and he makes room and chops it down to deep point
Raina to Hussey, 2 runs sprays it full and slightly wide from round the wicket, he comes down the track and forces it to mid-off
Raina to Hussey, SIX runs gives it more air and he clears the front leg and slogs him cleanly against the turn and clears deep midwicket
Raina to Hussey, 1 run whams it down to long-off
Raina to Bailey, FOUR runs makes room to delivery wide of the off stump and he slices it wide of point, Ashwin can' cut it off at square third man
Raina to Bailey, 1 run quicker delivery, he places it down to short third man
Raina to Hussey, no run swings across the line and Dhoni whips off the bails
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run makes room and squeezes out a yorker length ball to the off side
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run pulls a slower ball straight to midwicket and he has to hurry, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end by Praveen but the batsman's home
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run oho! Bailey walks across to try and scoop it over short fine leg but he changes his mind and jabs it to Jadeja on the off side
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run good delivery, keeps him quiet again by bowling it full outside off, he chops it to deep backward point
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run swings and gets an inside edge which trickles past the stumps down to short fine leg
Vinay to Hussey, no run 5 off that over! The batsman makes room and fails to squeeze out a fast yorker outside off, good comeback by Vinay
Sharma to Bailey, no run slides it just wide of the leg stump and just misses the stumps, swing and a miss
Sharma to Bailey, 1 run another drop, this was thudded hard back to Rahul's left, stuck his hand out but couldn't hang on
Sharma to Hussey, SIX runs tossed up and Hussey chips down the track and lofts cleanly over long-on
Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs swings it towards wide long-on and Jadeja nearly over-runs it, manages to get his left hand out to stop it
Sharma to Hussey, OUT Hussey aims for the big slog but Rahul pushes it flatter and on the stumps, swing and a miss and it hits the timber
Sharma to Marsh, 1 leg bye another quick and flat delivery and Marsh swings and the ball clips his pads and rolls to the off side

Australia should be pretty happy with this effort. Rahul Sharma was also quite impressive despite those tough drops. It should be a challenge for India. Remains to be seen if the newly arrived bunch can pose a challenge to the hosts, for a change. Join us in 15
The ground is enveloped with smoke from the fireworks. What if it doesn't clear soon enough?! In the haze, Brett Lee gets ready to bowl
Lee to Gambhir, 2 wide that was wide! Of Harmison proportions, goes all the way towards first slip and rolls away
Lee to Sehwag, no run spoons it towards mid-off but it drops short of the fielder
Lee to Sehwag, FOUR runs too wide of the off stump and Sehwag reaches out and slaps it hard past point, typical Sehwag

Lee to Sehwag, OUT didn't take Australia too long to strike! Sehwag completely squared up outside the off stump, pacy delivery and he gets a thick leading edge that lobs to Hussey at first slip, Sehwag tries to work that to the on side
Lee to Kohli, 1 run shuffles and he clips it towards square leg to get off the mark
Lee to Gambhir, FOUR runs that was well played, Gambhir gets width outside the off stump and he punches it neatly and bisects the gap at cover point, pierces the gaps between the fielders
Lee to Gambhir, 1 leg bye nudges it off the hips down to short fine leg and they set off for a quick single
Doherty to Gambhir, no run gets good turn, forces Gambhir is forced to adjust and cut it to short third man
Doherty to Gambhir, 2 runs gets down the track and lofts him over midwicket, couldn't find the boundary
Doherty to Gambhir, 1 run stays back and pulls to square leg
Doherty to Kohli, no run turns and skids, Doherty posing some questions here, Kohli cuts
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run stays back and clips it against the turn to the on side and he has to scamper the single
Doherty to Gambhir, no run down the leg side and he sweeps and Gambhir's a bit surprised that wasn't given a wide
Lee to Kohli, no run Lee slides that one down the leg side and don't ask me why this wasn't given a wide!
Lee to Kohli, 1 wide down the leg side again and Kohli glances at the umpire, wide called this time
Lee to Kohli, 2 runs elegantly flicked away behind square on the on side, sign of a batsman in form
Lee to Kohli, 1 leg bye shuffles and tries to knock it to the on side again but the ball clips his hips and rolls aweay
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run cramps him for room but Gambhir softly taps it to the off side and takes a single, well done by the batsman
Lee to Kohli, SIX runs shot of intent from Kohli! Makes a hint of room and takes a pace down the pitch, gets under the bounce and lofts cleanly over long-on
Lee to Kohli, 1 run a bit wide outside off and he punches it wide of mid-off
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run good running again, he squeezes out a yorker swinging in late to the off side and sets off for a quick single
Faulkner to Gambhir, 1 run clips it to the on side and they rotate the strike well
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run he picks a slower delivery from outside the off stump and mistimes the pull to the on side
Faulkner to Gambhir, 1 run short and wide and he reaches out and steers it to third man
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run excellent running by Kohli, he clips it in front of mid-on and puts pressure on the fielder
Faulkner to Gambhir, FOUR runs poor delivery and he punishes him for it, low full toss outside the off stump, he closes the face of the bat slightly and ensures he times the flick well past mid-on
Christian to Kohli, 1 run chips down the track and mistimes it down to deep square leg
Christian to Gambhir, FOUR runs Gambhir makes room to a delivery swinging away and carves it over extra cover, just manages to find the boundary
Christian to Gambhir, 1 run very wide of the off stump but Gambhir chases it but can't beat backward point, packed off-sid field there
Christian to Kohli, 1 run full on middle and off and he clips it elegantly towards deep midwicket
Christian to Gambhir, 1 run gives him width and he slices it to the off side, point slides and rebounds it to gully
Christian to Kohli, 1 run stays back and clips it down to midwicket
Hussey to Kohli, no run round the wicket, shapes to cut but misses
Hussey to Kohli, 1 run tucks it towards short square leg and he takes a single
Hussey to Gambhir, OUT soft dismissal! Extra flight from Hussey, Gambhir makes a bit of room to carve it with the turn over the infield on the off side but he scoops it inside out to Marsh at cover
Hussey to Raina, 1 run slides towards his body and he tucks it to the on side
Hussey to Kohli, no run continues round the wicket to the right-hander, Kohli tries to run it down the off side but misses
Hussey to Kohli, 1 run stays back and tucks it down to deep midwicket
Hogg to Kohli, 2 runs drops it short and he thumps it down to long-on, Warner throws it over the keeper's head and they take the overthrow
Hogg to Kohli, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg and he clips it towards midwicket
Hogg to Raina, 1 run

Hogg to Kohli, OUT Warner takes it at the edge of long-on! Hogg drops it a bit short and Kohli stays back and pulls, he realises instantly that he may not have got the required distance, Warner jogs back at long-on and doesn't have to look back, Hogg take
Hogg to Raina, no run defended on the front foot, Raina playing safe after the fall of the wicket
Hogg to Raina, no run tucks it off the front foot and the fielder at mid-on does well to slide and cut it off

Hussey to Rohit Sharma, OUT Rohit falls first ball! Hussey bowls from round the wicket, bowls it flat and quick, lands on middle, spins towards the pads, he tries to tuck it but leaves a gap, the ball deflects off his pads and onto the stumps
Hussey to Dhoni, no run full on the stumps and he clips it to mid-on
Hussey to Dhoni, no run
Hussey to Dhoni, no run skids through outside off and Dhoni nearly edges it as he tries to cut
Hussey to Dhoni, 1 run flatter delivery and he pushes it to long-on
Hussey to Raina, no run flatter delivery and Raina comes forward and defends, the fall of wickets has halted India's plan of accelerating
Hogg to Dhoni, no run comes forward and gets a leading edge to the off side
Hogg to Dhoni, no run gets forward and clips it straight to midwicket
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run stays at the crease, waits for the turn and cuts just wide of point
Hogg to Raina, no run goes back and cuts him down to point
Hogg to Raina, 2 runs spins it back in and Raina is cramped up, the ball clips his pads and then hits the bat and rolls to third man, Hogg appeals but that was missing off
Hogg to Raina, 1 run pushes a single down to mid-off
Doherty to Raina, 1 run comes down the track and takes a single to long-0n
Doherty to Dhoni, no run turns and skids, Dhoni can only tap it to the off side
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run drifts inwards and he clips him towards midwicket
Doherty to Raina, 1 run gets on his knee and thumps it past the non-striker and down to long-off
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run low full toss and he places it down to sweeper cover
Doherty to Raina, FOUR runs low full toss down leg and he whams it down the leg side and down to fine leg, poor ball and punished
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run full on middle and leg and he places it to midwicket
Hogg to Raina, 1 run stays back and cuts it to point
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run
Hogg to Raina, 1 run excellent fielding! Phew, Raina clubs a full toss down the ground and Hussey runs to his left at long-on and nearly pulls off a blinder on the dive, he saves a boundary though
Hogg to Dhoni, no run driven straight to extra cover
Hogg to Dhoni, no run turns and bounces and beats him, Dhoni truly foxed
Christian to Raina, 1 run short down the leg side and Raina swivels and pulls to fine leg, he controlled the shot
Christian to Dhoni, 1 run swings it inwards and he gets forward and taps it to the off side

Christian to Raina, OUT not too sure where Raina was trying to hit that, he made room to a delivery angling across him from over the wicket, tried to swing him across the line instead of going over the off side, inside edge crashes onto the stumps
Christian to Jadeja, 1 run could have been six down! Dabbed it to the off side and set off for a single which was never there, the fielder's under-arm flick was wide at the batsman's end
Christian to Dhoni, no run nips it back in and Dhoni taps it back down the track
Christian to Dhoni, no run once again Dhoni cramped for room, he can only push it down the track
Lee to Jadeja, no run the slower ball and Jadeja swings at thin air, the ball kept a bit low
Lee to Jadeja, 1 run angles across him and he dabs it to the off side
Lee to Dhoni, no run Full and wide and Dhoni can only squirt it straight to mid-off, he really had to stretch
Lee to Dhoni, 1 wide sprays it really wide outside off, he was bowling to an imaginary first slip
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run tucks it with soft hands towards mid-on and scampers the single, excellent fielding and back-hand flick by the fielder
Lee to Jadeja, no run stays back and steers it towards point
Lee to Jadeja, 1 run stays back at the crease and tucks it towards square leg
Christian to Jadeja, FOUR runs any boundary is like a mirage for India, exquisite timing, Jadeja opens the face and times it well and beats the gap at extra cover, beats the fielders
Christian to Jadeja, no run fuller delivery and he pushes it back to the bowler
Christian to Dhoni, 2 runs slaps a wide delivery outside off and beats point, Lee does brilliantly to slide and cut it off just in front of the rope
Christian to Dhoni, 2 runs tucks it towards midwicket and they take the first one hard, they throw to the wrong end
Christian to Dhoni, 1 run
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run pitches outside leg and hits his pads and rolls away
Hogg to Ashwin, 1 run chips down the track and pushes it towards mid-off
Hogg to Dhoni, no run sharp turn inwards and Dhoni's caught unawares slightly and manages to defend
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run gets forward and pushes a single to cover
Hogg to Ashwin, FOUR runs Ashwin chips down the track and neatly clubs him with the turn over midwicket, clean strike
Hogg to Ashwin, 2 runs chips down the wicket and lofts him over wide mid-off, Hussey runs across and cuts it off,,Australia have been superb on the field
Christian to Dhoni, (no ball) SIX runs Christian errs by bowling a full toss just above the waist height, Dhoni picks it early and clubs him over square leg, it's called a no-ball as well
Christian to Dhoni, 2 runs tucks him down to deep midwicket for a couple
Christian to Dhoni, no run pushes it softly back to the bowler, tucked for room
Christian to Dhoni, FOUR runs take that! Christian bowls the slower ball and Dhoni picks that from the crease, fetches it from outside off and clubs it down to long-on, the fielder had no chance
Christian to Dhoni, 1 run stays back and tucks it with the angle to the on side
Christian to Ashwin, 1 leg bye clips his pads and rolls to the on side as he tries to flick it away
Christian to Dhoni, no run ends the over with a dot ball as he pushes it down the track, a better over for India nevertheless
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run Ashwin goes right across his stumps to paddle it down to fine leg but the slower ball defeats him, he should give Dhoni the strike
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run full outside the off stump and he gets across and taps it to point
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run uses the crease and thumps it through the line down to long-off
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run full outside off and he squirts it out to long-off
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run doesn't pick the slower delivery and he swivels and tries to pull, the ball hits his pads and dribbles away
Faulkner to Dhoni, SIX runs amazing bat speed! He picks a fractionally short delivery from outside off and clubs him over deep midwicket, all power
Doherty to Ashwin, no run comes down the track and he checks his shot and plays it softly
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run comes down the track and forces a single to long-on
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run sprays it full and wide and he reaches out and squirts it out to the off side
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run low full toss and he pushes it down the track to long-on
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run full and wide outside the off stump and he chases it and places it to sweeper cover
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run full and straight and he takes a single to long-on, end of a very good over
Lee to Ashwin, 1 run full delivery on the off stump and he squeezes it out to mid-on
Lee to Dhoni, no run on the blockhole outside the off stump and Dhoni swings and misses, it's a wonder how the bat didn't fly away
Lee to Dhoni, 2 runs on the blockhole outside off and Dhoni swings again, it flies off the toe of the bat down to long-off and he swivels at the crease with the momentum
Lee to Dhoni, 1 wide Lee bowls to first slip again, funny old game for Lee
Lee to Dhoni, no run swings him to midwicket with one arm, sends Ashwin back and Lee breaks the stumps but he failed to gather the ball

Lee to Dhoni, no run it's a bird! It's a plane! No, it's a bat! It was always going to happen, Dhoni swings like there's no tomorrow and the bat lands somewhere near square leg, Lee was appealing for a caught behind but everybody was only gazing at the w
Lee to Dhoni, SIX runs carbon copy of Dhoni's six to seal the World Cup, different scenario now, over long-on
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 wide
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run makes room and he pushes it to long-on
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run low full toss and he forces it to long-off
Doherty to Ashwin, no run squeezes out a yorker back to the bowler
Doherty to Ashwin, no run tries to paddle it to fine leg and misses
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run on the blockhole and he squirts it out to mid-on
Doherty to Dhoni, 2 runs low full toss outside the off stump and he scoops it to wide long-off
The presentation should happen any time soon. Matthew Wade's Australia's biggest positive from this game.

Jokes aside, Australia were relentless in the field. They took their catches and barely let anything slip between them. Dhoni looked dangerous with some of those shots he played down the ground but he needed to dent Australia's psyche with successive boundaries
The teams head to Melbourne for the second and final T20, on Friday. We'll see you then. Thanks for your company. Cheers!
Australia won by 31 runs
Player of the match is Matthew Wade, AUS
